pages.text: $(1)Bizarrely, it seems that the Portal actually absorbs Power when connected via a Copper Sign to the Crucible. I can't imagine a use for such a phenomenon, so I suppose the exploration ends here...

$(o)Hello again. Yes, this seems like a dead end, but be persistent! Sacrificing a large amount of the $(4)power the portals secrete over long time spans$(0) is the key to a curious effect. $(br2)The change can only reverse if the portal frame remains intact.
